titleStmt.title: The politician discovered, or, Considerations of the late pretensions that France claims to England and Ireland, and her designs and plots in order thereunto in two serious discourses / by a true Protestant and well-wisher of his countrey.
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for and are to be sold by Langley Curtis ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to William Petty. cf. NUC.
